application

Class MovieDBAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.MovieDBAccount

  • public class MovieDBAccount
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates an account which links with an existing movie database account. This class manages account preferences (ex. favorites and watch list).
    Since:
    2017-07-07
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Joseph Cutino

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MovieDBAccount(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Public constructor which creates a TmdbApi, session token, account, and account ID for use throughout this program.
